title: Dakishime Nasai!
description:
1. Dakishimenasai! (Gimme a Hug!)
2. Motto Dakishimenasai! (Gimme More Hugs!)
3. Dakishimesasenai! (Lemme Hug You!)
4. Yume ni made Mita
5. Mezase Bacouple
6. Seishun Wild Pitch
7. Sasotte Kashiwagi-san
8. Nakayoshi Hole
9. Kimi no Kao ga Suki
10. Top Gear
11. Gekiteki na Fuufu (Dramatic Couple)
12. Makuai (Intermezzo)
